name: No Sugar Apple Pie
author: Carol
summary: This sweet, tart apple pie contains no added sugar, for a wholesome take on a classic dessert.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can unsweetened apple juice concentrate, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a small bowl whisk together cornstarch, cinnamon, and 1/3 cup of the apple juice concentrate
In a large saucepan simmer apples with remaining apple juice concentrate until apples are tender, about 10 minutes
Stir in cornstarch mixture and continue to simmer until thickened
Spoon apple mixture into pastry-lined pie plate
Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until crust is golden brown
